snippet: The Gulf Cooperation Council came to Qatar’s defense after an Egyptian official accused Qatar of supporting terrorism in a dispute over airstrikes by Egypt in Libya.
abstract: Gulf Cooperation Council, group representing oil-rich Persian Gulf monarchies, comes to Qatar's defense after Egypt accuses country of supporting terrorism; move seems aimed at balancing allegiances and uniting Sunni Arab states against threats of Islamic State and Shiite Iran.
lead_paragraph: The Gulf Cooperation Council came to Qatar’s defense after an Egyptian official accused Qatar of supporting terrorism in a dispute over airstrikes by Egypt in Libya.

headline.main: Gulf Leaders Back Qatar in Its Feud With Egypt
headline.print_headline: Gulf Leaders Back Qatar in Its Feud With Egypt
